hobby.name: Fitness
hobby.description: Fitness means the whole of sports and activities that are practiced in gyms, or at home.
hobby.who: I mostly fitness alone, but sometimes I go with friends.
hobby.where: I have a subscription to my local gym, Aerofit.
hobby.when: I (try to) go to the gym 3-4 times a week.
hobby.duration: When i go to the gym i always train 2 hours
hobby.why: Because I want to get stronger and lose weight.

hobby.name: Gaming
hobby.description: A video game is an electronic game that involves interaction with a user interface to generate visual feedback on a video device such as a TV screen or computer monitor.
hobby.who: I play games alone, or with friends, or family.
hobby.where: I mostly play at home, but sometimes at a friends house, or at the arcade.
hobby.duration: On weekdays only 1-2 hours and in the weekend up to 5 hours.
